capsules_submitted.utterance: I'm really proud to say that I have a strong affinity for the Hogwarts school of witchcraft and wizardry. It's an incredible place with such rich history and magical traditions. I've always felt a deep connection to the values of loyalty, bravery, and fairness that are at the heart of the Hogwarts community.

I'm a huge fan of the Hogwarts houses, and I have to say that being affiliated with Hogsmeade village is really cool. It's like, you're part of this whole magical community that's just waiting to be explored. I've always been drawn to the idea of being a bit of an outsider, but still having a strong connection to the wizarding world - it sounds like a pretty great way to live, if you ask me!
